name: Breeze: the Casual Math Tutor
description:
# WARNING:: Memory game!

# Shift to move faster
# Control to rewind

PLEASE remember everything..
PLEASE defrost your brain!!1!

Remember = good = :)
Forget = bad = :(

Make sure to stay hydrated!
